description: Brayden is at his studio setting up making sure lights are ready for Armando when he arrives but when Armando finally shows up he speaks no English which Brayden had no clue about. Brayden tries to understand what the hell Armando is saying but he can't get through at all. The best thing he can do is show some body language to communicate what needs to be done and instead Armando takes his shirt off and the two begin to kiss. Brayden is extremely turned on by the Spanish coming out of Armando's hot mouth. Armando loves to talk dirty in his native tounge as he fucks Braydens mouth and eventually his smooth tight ass. Brayden's hole opens wide and takes a good pounding from Armando until he blows his hot load all over the place. What a great end to a photo shoot but looks like he will have to come back for actual photos. Enjoy!
series: EBD - 501 - Armando De Armas & Brayden Allen
title: Body Language
